languages.text: "Интересно, в какой момент ересь запятнала твою душу?"
"I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."
languages.original_text: "Интересно, в какой момент ересь запятнала твою душу?"

traits.locale_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy?"
"I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy?"
"I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."
"I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."
"I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."
"I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."

languages.text: « Je me demande quand l'hérésie a souillé votre âme. »
languages.original_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande quand l'hérésie a souillé votre âme. »

languages.text: «Me pregunto cuándo contaminó la herejía tu alma».
languages.original_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Me pregunto cuándo contaminó la herejía tu alma».

languages.text: “我想知道，你的灵魂是什么时候被异端邪说玷污的。”
languages.original_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."

traits.locale_text: “我想知道，你的灵魂是什么时候被异端邪说玷污的。”

languages.text: 「お前の魂は、どの時点で異端に染まったのだろう」
languages.original_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の魂は、どの時点で異端に染まったのだろう」

languages.text: "Ich frage mich, an welchem Punkt Eure Seele von der Ketzerei befleckt wurde."
languages.original_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich frage mich, an welchem Punkt Eure Seele von der Ketzerei befleckt wurde."

languages.text: "Ruhunun ne zaman kâfirlikle kirlendiğini merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I wonder at what point your soul was tainted by heresy."
